caption.p: Protective effect of the Protaetia brevitarsis seulensisâ€™ water extract (PBWE) on seizure symptoms in trimethyltin (TMT)-treated mice. ( a) Schematic diagram showing the timeline of drug administration, behavioral tests, and sacrifice. ( b) PBWE pretreatment ameliorated TMT-induced seizure behaviors on day 2 ( n = 10 mice per group). Values are reported as median of percentile + interquartile. * p < 0.05 vs. TMT-alone treated group.
